title: kaDalOram kOvilum
sahitya:
kaDalOram kOvilum En perum kaDalAna pugazh koNDa kandanE undanukku


anupallavi

  paDavE muDiyAda iDar kaDalai tANDa diDhamAna vazhi kATTum guruvallavO unakku


caraNam    jnAttilE periya kaDal allavO para mOna kaDal kaDanda poruL allavO
nI shOkak-kaDal tIrkkum tiruvallavO vishAkA guhA aruL kaDal allavO unakku
